_xResult.title: Here Comes The Pride
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made boho dress with crystals, embroidered bodice
_xResult.longdesc:
What a splendid dress, for a splendid day! This delicate and feminine custom made to measure dress can easily be your bridal gown, it's so sweet and innocent. The bodice is decorated with pale pink Italian lace and is hand-embroidered in couture embroidery style with pearls, beads, fabric flowers and Swarovski crystals. The beautiful maxi chiffon skirt is hand pleated and floats when you walk down the [aisle? garden path? streets of Nashville?] Insert your own romantic adventures here...

 

- A line dress with pleated chiffon skirt
- Attached lace top with spaghetti straps
- Maxi length (long dress) ends at ankle unless otherwise specified

 

Color: Ivory | pale pink
Fabric: Chiffon, lace (viscose lining)
